CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Note that , in stark contrast to PCDTBT : PC71BM system in which thermal annealing reduced the photovoltaic parameters ( FF , J SC , and V OC ) , 22 the performance of all PCDSeBT - based devices for this study is considerably improved as a result of thermal treatment.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PC71BM |
| PCDSeBT |

Explanation:

* PCDTBT is a polymer used in organic solar cells.
* PC71BM is a fullerene derivative used as an electron acceptor material in organic solar cells.
* PCDSeBT is a polymer used in organic solar cells, which is a variant of PCDTBT with additional selenium atoms.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PC71BM |
| PCDSeBT |

Explanation:

* PCDTBT and PC71BM are both materials used in organic solar cells, as mentioned in the paragraph.
* PCDSeBT is also a material used in organic solar cells, which is a variant of PCDTBT with additional selenium atoms.

All three entities are materials, and they are referred to clearly in the paragraph. Therefore, all three entities are valid "Material Name" entities.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Note that , in stark contrast to PCDTBT : PC71BM system in which thermal annealing reduced the photovoltaic parameters ( FF , J SC , and V OC ) , 22 the performance of all PCDSeBT - based devices for this study is considerably improved as a result of thermal treatment.

Let's think step by step.

* Property Value
----------------

| Property Value |
| --- |
| FF |
| J SC |
| V OC |

Explanation:

* FF, J SC, and V OC are the photovoltaic parameters that are mentioned in the paragraph as being reduced in the PCDTBT : PC71BM system and improved in the PCDSeBT-based devices after thermal treatment. FF stands for Fill Factor, J SC for Short-Circuit Current Density, and V OC for Open-Circuit Voltage.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

* Property Value
----------------

| Property Value |
| --- |
| J SC |

Explanation:

* After reviewing the paragraph again, I realized that FF and V OC are not explicitly mentioned as values of material properties. However, J SC (Short-Circuit Current Density) is clearly mentioned as a photovoltaic parameter, which is a value of a material property. Therefore, I have removed FF and V OC from the table and left only J SC.
